message:
本来想的是寻找一个文件夹下的所有文件然后移动到另一个文件夹里。应该是find+mv吧，就开启Google开始抄命令，然后回车……
然后出现了一堆不知道什么鬼的东西
mv: rename / to ../Moonlight2: Is a directory
mv: rename /.dbfseventsd to ../Moonlight2: Permission denied
mv: rename /.DocumentRevisions-V100 to ../Moonlight2: Permission denied
find: /.DocumentRevisions-V100: Permission denied
mv: rename /.DS_Store to ../Moonlight2: Permission denied
mv: rename /.file to ../Moonlight2: Permission denied
mv: rename /.fseventsd to ../Moonlight2: Permission denied
find: /.fseventsd: Permission denied
mv: rename /.PKInstallSandboxManager to ../Moonlight2: Permission denied
mv: rename /.Spotlight-V100 to ../Moonlight2: Permission denied
find: /.Spotlight-V100: Permission denied
mv: rename /.Trashes to ../Moonlight2: Permission denied
find: /.Trashes: Permission denied
mv: rename /.vol to ../Moonlight2: Permission denied
mv: rename /Applications to ../Moonlight2: Operation not permitted
override rw-r--r--  root/wheel for ../Moonlight2? (y/n [n])

然后我不知为什么居然选了个y……
mv: rename /Applications/Acorn.app/Contents/Frameworks to ../Moonlight2: Not a directory
mv: rename /Applications/Acorn.app/Contents/Frameworks/AcornImage.framework to ../Moonlight2: Not a directory
mv: rename /Applications/Acorn.app/Contents/Frameworks/AcornImage.framework/Versions to ../Moonlight2: Not a directory
...


然后等回过神来的时候已经 not a directory 到 /Applications/Adobe/Flash Player/AddIns/airappinstaller 了。
不过似乎因为not a directory（应该是-r的锅？）还有没有sudo所以似乎什么都没有发生改变的样子……

不过那个 root/wheel 该怎么改回去呢
下次再也不敢随随便便用这种结合了若干个程序的命令了
title: 很好……用find和mv做出了类似rm -rf的效果（不过not a directory所以暂时还没死
